document.full_text: the international criminal court prosecutor warned col. muammar el-qaddafi that if he attacked the eastern city that is the rebels' base or any other towns, he would be committing war crimes.
document.title: qaddafi and his forces warned on war crimes
lines_and_colors: the international criminal court prosecutor warned col. muammar el-qaddafi that if he attacked the eastern city that is the rebels' base or any other towns, he would be committing war crimes.
